title: Riot, please don't remove the Hunt in the upcoming Assassin rework
body: I know Rengar is going to be receiving major changes in the update, and I expect that Bonetooth Necklace will be changed or even removed along with his ult, but PLEASE dont remove the Hunt and his interaction with Kha'Zix. I don't play either of those champions but I was thinking about that today and how it is the only actually gameplay altering Easter egg, and while arguments could be made against it, I just feel it's been an awesome part of League for as long as those two champions have coexisted and I hope it will be kept through the Assasin roster update.

replies.body: We'll be keeping the Rengar/Kha'Zix quest after the assassin update. That style of quest's got some issues, which is why we haven't added a lot of new ones despite that one being good fun, we don't currently have any plans to remove it though. Will have to make some updates to it to account for kit changes however.

so basically its being turned into a quest like sejunia/ashe/anivia/lissandra type deal, where its there, but meaningless. "package available" 

you're removing the free stats and build up associated from it in order to make a more balanced core kit.
No, I'd expect it'll still have gameplay benefit for Rengar if he's successful. Current plan is that Kha'Zix's bonus will still be the 4th evolution point for example.
Can you make it so only kills count for the Hunt?  It's kinda lame for the Kha'Zix to hit Rengar once, then his team obliterates him and Kha'Zix still gets the buff for doing no real work.
but why would you feel the need to deny either of them part of their kits for not racking up kills?
